## IBackdrop3DScene.NormalVector property

Returns or sets a normal vector. To be more precise, this attribute defines a vector normal to the face of the backdrop plane. Vector represented by array of 3 float values which define X, Y and Z coordinates. Read/write Single[].

```csharp
public float[] NormalVector { get; set; }
```
